content.question: Which of the following best supports the claim that the New Negro movement would create “a universal racial art”?

choices.label: The global tour of the Fisk Jubilee Singers
The choir music of the African Methodist Episcopal Church
The jazz music of artists such as Duke Ellington
The spirituals performed at annual Juneteenth ceremonies

content.answer: The jazz music of artists such as Duke Ellington

topic.text: 3.11: The New Negro Movement and the Harlem Renaissance

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
